document.text:
From: "> 
To:'
Cc: 
Subject: bail memo 
Date: Thu, 02 Jul 2020 04:51:02 +0000 
Attachments: 2020-07-02, GM detention memorandum.docx 
Hi M, 
Here's the final version we plan to file in the morning. It's in brief format, at the District of New Hampshire's request. The 
plan is to file it in SDNY and email a copy to the DNH magistrate judge, but let us know if you think we should proceed 
otherwise (the AUSA in DNH didn't seem to have a view on how we should file). We didn't want to file it with New 
Hampshire captions and signature blocks, as much as I would have gotten a kick out of signing as a SAUSA. But let us know 
if you think we should be going about this a different way. 
Thanks! 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00031107
